long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tendex is the All-In-One outbound data gathering and automation tool. Get company information and lead data from the business and people behind the website you are visiting. Sync LinkedIn and Xing profiles with Tendex and your CRM system and enrich missing data points, such as an email or phone number. The Tendex Chrome extension is your all-in-one tool to make your outbound sales process more seamless.

Why would you use the Tendex Chrome extension?

We cover the following use cases:

1. Visit a website and click the Tendex chrome extension to receive company information such as the revenue, alternative contact data like phone number, a description, address, technologies the website uses and more.
2. Find all employees (leads) that are related with the company including their first name, last name, job title and contact information (email, phone, Linkedin, Xing, etc.) 
3. Visiting a LinkedIn or Xing profile and needing the email or phone number? Just open the extension and we show you the complete data.
4. Want to sync a LinkedIn lead, or Xing lead with your Hubspot CRM? Just connect the extension with Hubspot and you can directly send the lead to your Hubspot.
5. Want to automatically contact that lead through a Tendex campaign (email cadence or  LinkedIn automation)? No problem, just add the lead to your existing campaign with one click. 

For whom is the extension?

1. For Tendex.net platform users
2. For anyone who wants to excel in B2B sales
3. For recruiters
4. For people who just want lead data and company information 

For more information about the Tendex B2B sales platform visit tendex.net.
